citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:10pm on April 6,
2023. Inspector knocked on the door and a representative for the family answered. It was reported that the licensee was
not at home and would not be for a while. No authorized individual was able to accompany the inspector on the
inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:10pm on April 6, 
2023. Inspector knocked on the door and a representative for the family answered. It was reported that the licensee was 
not at home and would not be for a while. No authorized individual was able to accompany the inspector on the 
inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
